THE BOYZ

Introduction

Son Young-jae, known by his stage name Eric, is the lead dancer, rapper, and maknae of The Boyz under ONE HUNDRED. He debuted as a member of THE BOYZ on December 6, 2017, with the lead single "Boy" from their debut EP The First.

On March 4, 2022, IST Entertainment announced that Eric won't be participating in any activities for the time being due to health issues. On September 16th, 2022, IST Entertainment announced that Eric would return to promoting with THE BOYZ for the next album promotion.

Fun facts

1
Eric is a huge fan of Taemin & GOT7. He even uses Taemin's picture as his wallpaper.
…
2
Eric once thought his blood type is B as he has the characteristic of someone with B blood type. He wrote blood type in his profile as B and got called by his mom, telling him his blood type is A.
…
3
Eric wanted to be a baseball player but one day his sister show him a performance of Growl - Exo, making him changing his mind to be an idol.
…
4
Eric did ballet when he was 7 years old but he quit because of the tight outfit.
…
5
He can throw the baseball ball around 125 km.
…

When Eric has free time he hangs out with Juyeon or goes watch movies, sleeps, or plays video games.
…

Eric loves to clean. He’s in charge of cleaning the dorm.
…
